pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of an outdoor patio at a tropical location. The video contains a slow pan from right to left, but there is no significant subject motion. The scene features a round glass-topped table and lounge chairs on a concrete patio, which is adjacent to a sandy area with lush green trees and plants.
